title: 1979 European Cup (athletics)
text:
The 1979 European Cup was the seventh edition of the <a href="European%20Cup%20%28athletics%29">European Cup</a> of <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a>.
The ""A" Finals" were held in <a href="Turin">Turin</a>, <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. The first two teams qualified for the <a href="1979%20IAAF%20World%20Cup">1979 IAAF World Cup</a>.
"A" Final.
Held in Turin on 4 and 5 August.
"B" Final.
The winners qualified for the "A" final.
Men<br>
Held on 21 and 22 July in <a href="Karlovac">Karlovac</a>, Yugoslavia
Women<br>
Held on 21 July in <a href="Antony%2C%20Hauts-de-Seine">Antony</a>, France
Semifinals.
Men.
All semifinals were held on 30 June and 1 July. First two teams qualified for the "A" final (plus Italy as the host). Places 3–5 qualified for the "B" final.
Semifinal 1<br>
Held in <a href="L%C3%BCdenscheid">Lüdenscheid</a>, West Germany
Semifinal 2<br>
Held in <a href="Geneva">Geneva</a>, Switzerland
Semifinal 3<br>
Held in <a href="Malm%C3%B6">Malmö</a>, Sweden
Women.
First two teams qualified for the "A" final (plus Italy as the host). Places 3–5 qualified for the "B" final.
Semifinal 1<br>
Held in <a href="Sofia">Sofia</a>, Bulgaria, on 30 June
Semifinal 2<br>
Held in <a href="Sittard">Sittard</a>, Netherlands, on 1 July
Semifinal 3<br>
Held in <a href="Cwmbran">Cwmbran</a>, United Kingdom, on 1 July
Preliminary.
Men.
Preliminary round was held on 16 and 17 June in <a href="Luxembourg%20City">Luxembourg City</a>. First three teams advanced to the semifinals.
